name: Geary Blvd.
preparation:
Triple-casked whiskey, sake and coconut water may not seem like the most natural combination, but they serve as the basis for this irresistible recipe. Make it for yourself to see why it’s a winner from San Francisco’s Slane Cocktail Series.

Gently muddle the lime zest, pickled ginger and shiso leaf in a mixing glass.

Add the whiskey, sake, coconut water and cracked ice and stir.

Strain into a chilled rocks glass over one large ice cube.

Garnish with a shiso leaf.
